title: What are the universities in India for development studies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Development Studies is a very recent discipline of study, there are fewer Institutes in India which offer an MA in Development Studies. Some of the institutes which offer MA in Development Studies in India are: Indian Institute of Technology, GuwahatiJamia Millia Islamia University, DelhiTata Institute of Social Sciences, MumbaiAmbedkar University, DelhiCentral University of South Bihar, PatnaAzim Premji University, BangaloreNational Institute of Technology, RourkelaMahatma Gandhi University, KottayamOther than this , all together in the area of Development Management & Leadership is provided by Indian School of Development Management(ISDM), Delhi in its one year flagship program (PGP-DL)
